Email_1.Subject: Good Job Today
Email_1.Body:
Good job today on your first big extraction!
    You see, it is important to go through people
    desktop so we can get scum like those out of
    reach of our children! I still cannot believe
    that a person like that was a teacher!
            
    We hope to see more good work from you.
            
    Your next assignment is ready in the Graph
    application.
